IX.iii.1.l.9.
e
.
Example:  Installment Sale
Situation
:  A Veteran sells their house for $80,000.  The Veteran receives a cash payment of $40,000 and a cash payment of $45,000.
Result
:  This is an installment sale for VA pension purposes and $5,000 is countable as interest income when the Veteran receives the $45,000.
title: M21-1, Part IX, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section I - Counting Specific Types of Income
citation: Part IX, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section I
